Class Branch

  • java.lang.Object
    • Branch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Store

    public class Branch
extends java.lang.Object
implements Store
    A class that represents Branches of a company. It has it's own stock and number.

      • totalBranchCount

        public static int totalBranchCount

    • Constructor Detail

      • Branch

        public Branch()
        Constructor that creates a new branch with the following branch number. Increments the totalBranchCount everytime a new branch is created and this is used to determine the branch number.

      • getProduct

        public Product getProduct(int index)
                   throws InvalidIndex
        Returns a product from the stock with the given index.
        Specified by:
        getProduct in interface Store
        Parameters:
        index - is an integer that will be the index of the product that will be searched in the stock of the branch. It cannot be less than 0 or bigger than 118.
        Returns:
        the product that is inside the stock with the given index value.
        Throws:
        InvalidIndex - if the given index does not meet the requirements.

      • printStock

        public void printStock()
        Prints out the products that is inside the stock with the amounts.
        Specified by:

      • changeStock

        public void changeStock(Product addedProduct,
               int amount)
        Changes the amount of the product that will be given as addedProduct.
        Specified by:
        changeStock in interface Store
        Parameters:
        addedProduct - is the product that will be added to/remove from the stock of the branch.
        amount - determines how many will be removed or added to the stock.

      • changeNo

        public void changeNo(int newNo)
        Changes the number of the branch.
        Specified by:
        changeNo in interface Store
        Parameters:
        newNo - will be the new number of the store. If there is already a branch with the given newNo, exists because there cannot be 2 branches with the same number.

      • isInStock

        public int isInStock(Product searchedProduct)
        Searchs for a product in the stock of the branch.
        Specified by:
        isInStock in interface Store
        Parameters:
        searchedProduct - is the product that will be searched in the stock of the branch.
        Returns:
        the index that the product is stored in the branch, if there is at least 1 one it.
